name: KeyEvent
helpString:
This is an extended component that handles keyboard events. It contains nearly 300 key constants and supports various keyboard events. You can also customize your own custom keyboard events based on the onKey method. The events in this extension can be used as a monitor for an Android TV remote control, a Bluetooth keyboard, or an OTG USB keyboard.Before using, call the Arrangement property to bind a layout.
这是一个处理键盘事件的拓展组件,包含将近300个按键常量，支持各种键盘事件，还可以根据onKey方法定制自己的自定义键盘事件，这个拓展中的事件可以被用作AndroidTV遥控器的监听，也可以使用蓝牙键盘或者OTG USB键盘在使用之前请先调用Arrangement属性绑定一个可视的布局
